title: Strengthening Data Science Practical Competencies: Working Memory-Sensitive Mathematical Intervention for Adult Learners with Learning Disabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Adult learners with learning disabilities improve accuracy in two-step math problem-solving by 40% or more using strategies that minimize working memory load.
Weekly formative assessments improve learners’ mathematical reasoning skills by 25% within three months.
Reduced instructional methods tailored to individual cognitive levels sustain math concept application skills for six months or longer.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
